entities.name: bane

entities.name: firenze

entities.name: unicorn
entities.description: An animal whose blood has special properties, mentioned by Firenze as something that should not be killed for its horn or tail-hair.

relationships.description: Harry asks Firenze why Bane is angry, showing Harry's curiosity about the situation.
Firenze explains to Harry what unicorn blood is used for and its terrible price, showing Firenze's knowledge of magical creatures.
Harry asks Firenze about the use of unicorn blood, showing Harry's interest in learning more.
Firenze guides Harry through the trees and answers his questions, showing Firenze's role as a mentor or guide.
